original_title: Metti lo diavolo tuo ne lo mio inferno
overview: Ricciardetto is a fourteenth-century playboy who wants at all costs to sleep with the wife of the mayor of Montelupone. He succeeds, but is caught between the covers with the woman and sentenced to death. He will be saved by a kind of pilgrim saint who is in love with him.
title: Put Your Devil Into My Hell
